mapper.sql: a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.area_name AS "areaName", a.province_code AS "provinceCode.code", a.city_code AS "cityCode.code", a.area_level AS "areaLevel", a.parent_area_code AS "parent.code", a.sort_id AS "sortId", a.state AS "state", a.remark AS "remark", a.tenant_id AS "tenantId", a.id AS "id"
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM gn_area a
AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gn_area( area_code, area_name, parent_ids, province_code, city_code, area_level, parent_area_code, sort_id, state, remark, tenant_id, id ) VALUES ( #{areaCode}, #{areaName}, #{parentIds}, #{provinceCode.code}, #{cityCode.code}, #{areaLevel}, #{parent.code}, #{sortId}, #{state}, #{remark}, #{tenantId}, #{id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gn_area SET area_code = #{areaCode}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, area_name = #{areaName}, province_code = #{provinceCode.code}, city_code = #{cityCode.code}, area_level = #{areaLevel}, parent_area_code = #{parent.code}, sort_id = #{sortId}, state = #{state}, remark = #{remark}, tenant_id = #{tenantId} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE gn_area SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
